name: [SFML Game Development] - Plane shooter
description:
Description:

You are the aircraft. You have no idea neither where you are nor what age it is. It seems your comrades were all swiped off. You only see enemies, and bullets cut through sky. The moment has come! The gear is in your hands. All you need to do is shooting, just take enemies down! Armed with machine gun and ballistic missiles, it is all you need to go. Survive! Glory awaiting in the end of this battlefield...

Main features:

- Customizable key bindings.

- Vibrant sounds.

- Retro top-down plane shooter style.

Credit:

The project is fully written in C++ and SFML - Simple and Fast Multimedia Library. The instructor is "SFML Game Development" book.

Big thank to xDeviruchi for their beautiful music.

Art is packed in Github respiratory.

Disclaimer:

The game is not my original work. It was published by SFML Game Development's authors. But since :

 - First, the project is free for non-commercial use.

 - Second, I could not find any excutable version of the game online. 

This game is posted for people interested in SFML game dev and wants to see what there is in the end of the book. I do not own anything out of excutable file. I did modify some sort of the codes, cut off some parts, but I hope it will not be too different from what you expected.
